identity.title: Updating an Element in the 2D Array

content.prompt: Construct a program that initializes a 3x4 two-dimensional matrix that has the numbers 1 through 12 for entries, sets the left-most element in the middle row of the matrix to be 20, and finally prints all the elements in the matrix.
